answers.answer: It was the same for me too ...probably has something to do with this being your first baby ...I'm 9 months now and it looks as if I'm barely 5 months  ..at first I used to be like if I'm pregnant I want the belly and all lol I felt cheated but now I'm happy I've made it to 38 weeks and no stretch marks and a healthy baby boy due any day now ..long as your baby is doing okay be happy...trust me

It can also be because of uterus placement. And the way baby is laying. Also, if you have a strong abdominal wall then it could take longer for you to start showing. Im 24 weeks with my first baby and I started showing around 13 weeks.
I was the same way with my first. Its normal you will probably start showing the last 2 months of your pregnancy

I'm 8 months with my first and people can't really tell I'm pregnante. It made me sad for a while and then I saw my friends struggling with extra weigth and aches... I'm tall and I have gestational diabetes so I'm on a strict diet. As long as baby is growing everything good. I understand do feeling a bit cheated because nobody can tell by looking at you.
Be thankful. This is also my first and Ill be five months tomorrow and have a small bump but my clothes dont fit anymore and its the worst :(

question: I be 5 months on saturday but no belly at all does anyone knw why??
title: ftm
